title: 3 bedroom apartment in Logan Square
app_fee: Application fee $55.00 per adults over 18 yrs old
posting_body: 3 bedroom apartment in Logan Square.
Features hardwood floors, New Kitchen, Washroom, thermal pane windows, Central heat air system and a private deck and is very well maintained.
2 flat building, 1st floor, one of the best deals on the market for your money.
Residential area, right of Fullerton, conveniently close to CTA blue line 'L' Station, and is just a 1/2 a block to the grocery stores.
Secured building with wrought iron fencing and a Security video camera system built-in for extra comfort.
One time Pet fee non-refundable of $500.
Additional fee for 2nd Pet $250.00, cannot weight no more than 15lbs.
Must have a 2 years or more employment history and a credit score of 700+++.
Available September 01, 2022
Application fee $55.00 per person over the age of 18 years old.
Max Roommates 3 only.
Building Address is 3721 W Belden Chicago, IL 60647,  1st floor,
Near the I90 and I94, minutes to blue line train station, CTA and Metra Station.
Call or Txt me to ask about the details & and to schedule appointment.
